Viral images of a man carrying an EVM ma: suggesting that the machines were being stolen during the Bihar polls.
The images were posted on Twitter by mul: including a Twitter user who accused the Election Commission of being a thief and questioned if Nitish Kumar would go to jail.
However: a fact-check by Alt News revealed that the images were actually from October 2019 and showed election commission officials carrying EVM machines to remote areas during the Maharashtra legislative assembly elections. Therefore, the claim of EVM machines being stolen during the Bihar polls was false.
